target.description: Position of the other end of the rope.

height1.description: Maximum height of the first jump.

height2.description: Maximum height of the second jump.

height3.description: Maximum height of the third jump.

time1.description: Time taken to restore control to the player for the first jump.

time2.description: Time taken to restore control to the player for the second jump.

time3.description: Time taken to restore control to the player for the third jump.

Extra.name: A rope that springs the player at multiple set heights.
